A ydych yn gwneud cais am brofiant ar gy: rhif ffôn

Are you applying for probate for the est: role in the person who has died’s estate – you can only use this service if you are responsible for the estate as an executor or an administrator

Are you applying for probate for the est: The location where you are planning to apply to the Probate Service is where you are sending your PA1 - Probate application form. There are different places throughout the UK but you can only use this service if you are planning to apply in England or Wales.
A ydych yn gwneud cais am brofiant ar gy: Y lleoliad lle rydych yn bwriadu gwneud cais i'r Gwasanaeth Profiant yw'r man lle rydych yn anfon eich PA1 - ffurflen gais ar gyfer Profiant. Mae gwahanol lefydd ar draws y DU ond gallwch ond ddefnyddio'r gwasanaeth hwn os ydych yn bwriadu gwneud cais yng Nghymru neu Loegr.

Are you applying for probate for the est: If the person who has died left a will then you will know if you are an executor of their estate as you will be named in it. If there is no will, the court will have named you as an administrator.
A ydych yn gwneud cais am brofiant ar gy: Os gadawyd ewyllys gan y person a fu farw, byddwch yn gwybod a ydych yn ysgutor ei ystâd gan y byddwch wedi'ch enwi ynddi. Os nad oes ewyllys, bydd y llys wedi'ch enwi fel gweinyddwr.

Are you applying for probate for the est: The phone number you give is one that HMRC can contact you on. This might happen after you have finished the estate report and it is being reviewed.
A ydych yn gwneud cais am brofiant ar gy: Y rhif ffôn a rowch yw un y gall CThEM ei ddefnyddio er mwyn cysylltu â chi. Gall hyn ddigwydd ar ôl i chi orffen yr adroddiad ynghylch yr ystâd a bod hwnnw'n cael ei adolygu.

Are you applying for probate for the est: You can find your National Insurance number on a payslip, a P45 or a P60 form.
A ydych yn gwneud cais am brofiant ar gy: Gallwch ddod o hyd i'ch rhif Yswiriant Gwladol ar slip cyflog, ffurflen P45 neu ffurflen P60.

A ydych yn gwneud cais am brofiant ar gy: Bydd angen yr wybodaeth ganlynol arnoch:

A ydych yn gwneud cais am brofiant ar gy: dyddiad y farwolaeth

Are you applying for probate for the est: last known contact address
A ydych yn gwneud cais am brofiant ar gy: y cyfeiriad hysbys diwethaf ar gyfer gohebu

Are you applying for probate for the est: country where they had their permanent home – you can only use this service if the person who has died lived in England or Wales
A ydych yn gwneud cais am brofiant ar gy: y wlad lle'r oedd ei gartref parhaol – gallwch ond ddefnyddio'r gwasanaeth hwn os oedd y person a fu farw'n byw yng Nghymru neu Loegr

Are you applying for probate for the est: relationship status
A ydych yn gwneud cais am brofiant ar gy: statws priodasol

Are you applying for probate for the est: The person who has died’s first and last name will be on the death certificate. If you did not know the person who has died, ask their family or friends for some details if you do not have them.
A ydych yn gwneud cais am brofiant ar gy: Bydd enw cyntaf ac olaf y person a fu farw ar y dystysgrif marwolaeth. Os nad oeddech yn adnabod y person a fu farw, gofynnwch i'w deulu neu ei ffrindiau am fanylion, os nad yw'r rheiny gennych.

Are you applying for probate for the est: The last known contact address is where they had their post sent before they died. This could be to a home that they owned or where they last lived.
A ydych yn gwneud cais am brofiant ar gy: Y cyfeiriad hysbys diwethaf ar gyfer gohebu yw'r cyfeiriad lle'r oedd yn cael ei bost cyn iddo farw. Gallai hwn fod yn gartref roedd yn berchen arno, neu'r man diwethaf lle'r oedd yn byw.

Are you applying for probate for the est: The person who has died’s relationship status is their actual situation when they died, not what they, or someone else, might have thought it to be. If the person who has died said they were single but they had been married at some time in their life and then divorced, you should select divorced.
A ydych yn gwneud cais am brofiant ar gy: Statws priodasol y person a fu farw yw ei sefyllfa wirioneddol pan fu farw, nid y statws yn ei farn ef, neu rywun arall. Os dywedodd y person a fu farw ei fod yn sengl ond y bu'n briod ryw adeg yn ystod ei fywyd cyn ysgaru, dylech ddewis wedi ysgaru.

Are you applying for probate for the est: You will need the person who has died’s:
A ydych yn gwneud cais am brofiant ar gy: Bydd angen y manylion canlynol arnoch am y person a fu farw:

Are you applying for probate for the est: The easiest thing to do is to ask the person who you are adding for their details. They will be able to find their National Insurance number on a payslip, a P45 or a P60 form.
A ydych yn gwneud cais am brofiant ar gy: Y dewis hawsaf yw eich bod yn gofyn i'r  person rydych yn ei ychwanegu am fanylion y person a fu farw. Gall ddod o hyd i'r rhif Yswiriant Gwladol ar slip cyflog, ffurflen P45 neu ffurflen P60.

Are you applying for probate for the est: Their name should be given as it is shown on their passport or birth certificate. This might be different to the name that you know them by.
A ydych yn gwneud cais am brofiant ar gy: Dylid rhoi ei enw fel y mae'n ymddangos ar ei basbort neu ei dystysgrif geni. Gallai hwnnw fod yn enw gwahanol i'r un yr ydych yn ei alw.

Are you applying for probate for the est: The phone number given is one that HMRC can contact this person on. This might happen after you have finished the estate report and it is being reviewed.
A ydych yn gwneud cais am brofiant ar gy: Y rhif ffôn a roddir yw un y gall CThEM ei ddefnyddio er mwyn cysylltu â'r person hwn. Gall hyn ddigwydd ar ôl i chi orffen yr adroddiad ynghylch yr ystâd a bod hwnnw'n cael ei adolygu.

Are you applying for probate for the est: You will need to have all of the details listed below before you start.
A ydych yn gwneud cais am brofiant ar gy: Bydd angen i chi gael yr holl fanylion a restrir isod cyn i chi ddechrau arni.

Are you applying for probate for the est: There is no way to save your progress until you have given all of these details, so only start once you have everything you will need.
A ydych yn gwneud cais am brofiant ar gy: Nid yw'n bosibl i chi gadw'ch gwaith hyd nes eich bod wedi rhoi'r holl fanylion hyn. Felly, dylech ond ddechrau arni pan fydd gennych bopeth sydd eu hangen arnoch.

Are you applying for probate for the est: It should take you no more than 30 minutes to finish all of registration.
A ydych yn gwneud cais am brofiant ar gy: Ni ddylai gymryd mwy na 30 munud i chi orffen y broses gofrestru gyfan.

Are you applying for probate for the est: find out what the value of the estate is when you have given all of the details about what was owned and owed – this will tell you if there is any Inheritance Tax to pay

Are you applying for probate for the est: If any of the details change, phone the Inheritance Tax helpline on 0300 123 1072. You will need the reference to change any details. If you are outside of the UK, call +44 300 123 1072.
A ydych yn gwneud cais am brofiant ar gy: Os oes unrhyw fanylion yn newid, rhowch alwad i'r Llinell Gymorth Treth Etifeddiant ar 0300 123 1072. Bydd angen y cyfeirnod arnoch er mwyn newid unrhyw fanylion. Os ydych y tu allan i'r DU, ffoniwch +44 300 123 1072.
